page.title: 17HOUSING IN LONGTON DISTRICT
page.content: { Housing}in the Longton area is very good. There is no overcrowding and every house has some area of garden. There is a mixture of detached, semi detached and a few terraced homes and flats. Some of the houses have converted the roof space into living accomodation. Around 18% of the homes are bungalows some of which are Old People's homes with a Warden looking after the Close. These are one bedroom homes with one lounge,a small kitchen and a bathroom. Most of the houses in the area have {central heating}run from a gas boiler, a few use electric storage heating and /or a coal fire. The more isolated farms use coke to run the boilers but very few are run on oil. Each Summer there is a{Best Kept {Garden Competition}and on the whole the gardens are very well kept.
